participant_1.background:
I have a unique way of enjoying my coffee, and I'm a dedicated worker who is still looking for the perfect partner.
I love how sci fi space adventures are able to take me to other worlds and explore new possibilities.
I'm not rich but I do have a lot of pictures and stories to share from my travels.
I lost a patient in my arms.
I don't care about social media as much as I do about my relationships with my friends and family.

participant_2.background:
My laptop is a great companion for my outdoor activities, especially when I'm hiking or camping.
I once told the cop I was on my way to an important city council meeting and he let me go with a warning.
One of my favorite books is "To Kill a Mockingbird" because it teaches important lessons about empathy and justice.
i am a psychology major.
my car needs some repairs.

content.text: Hi, how are you doing today?
Hi, I'm doing well, thanks for asking! How are you?
I'm doing alright, thanks! I'm just enjoying a cup of coffee and reading some sci fi.
Sounds nice! I love reading sci fi too. What are you reading right now?
I'm reading a book called The Martian. It's about an astronaut who gets stranded on Mars and has to figure out how to survive.
Oh, I've heard of that book! I've heard it's really good.
Yeah, it's really good so far! I'm really enjoying it.
No, I haven't seen the movie yet. I'm planning on seeing it soon though.
Oh, you should! It's really good too.
What kind of sci fi do you like to read?
I like all kinds of sci fi, but I especially like hard sci fi. I like books that are based in science and have realistic technology.
Me too! I like to be able to suspend my disbelief and really believe that the world I'm reading about could be real.
Exactly! I love that feeling of being transported to another world.
Me too! I'm glad to meet someone else who loves sci fi.
Me too! It's always nice to meet someone who shares the same interests.
